posts.title: Getting Started with React and Vite
posts.body: Vite has become the modern standard for React development. It offers incredibly fast build times and a superior developer experience compared to traditional tools.

posts.title: Mastering CSS Z-Index
posts.body: Managing CSS layers can be challenging. Understanding the Stacking Context is essential to prevent background blurs from overlapping your navigation menus.

posts.title: Why Java Rules the Enterprise Back-End
posts.body: Java remains the top choice for enterprise applications due to its robustness, scalability, and the massive ecosystem provided by frameworks like Spring Boot.

posts.title: AI in Modern Software Development
posts.body: From boilerplate generation to assisted debugging, AI is revolutionizing how we write and optimize code, allowing developers to focus on high-level architecture.
